channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver AS for ABAP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver AS for ABAP

item.title: CVE-2021-27603|2024-08-03T21:26:10.122Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20as%20for%20abap
item.description: An RFC enabled function module SPI_WAIT_MILLIS in SAP NetWeaver AS ABAP, versions - 731, 740, 750, allows to keep a work process busy for any length of time. An attacker could call this function module multiple times to block all work processes thereby causing Denial of Service and affecting the Availability of the SAP system.
